scripts.pods: cd ios && rm -f Podfile.lock && USE_FRAMEWORKS=static bundle exec pod install --repo-update && rm .xcode.env.local
scripts.nuke: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf ./ios/Pods && yarn
scripts.build:ios: react-native build-ios --scheme LucrasdkExample --mode Debug --extra-params "-sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO"
scripts.release:android: cd android && bundle exec fastlane distribute
scripts.release:ios: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane distribute
